snippet: “Shanghai Tango” is a compilation of works by the Chinese dancer and choreographer Jin Xing, whose life story is one of courage, controversy and unorthodoxy.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews performance by Jin Xing Dance Theater Shanghai at the Joyce Theater.
lead_paragraph: “Shanghai Tango” is a compilation of works by the Chinese dancer and choreographer Jin Xing, whose life story is one of courage, controversy and unorthodoxy.

headline.seo: Jin Xing’s ‘Shanghai Tango’ at Joyce Theater
headline.main: Biography Outshines Choreography in a Return to the New York Stage
headline.print_headline: Biography Outshines Choreography in a Return to the New York Stage
